reviewText: Libby has been a favorite of mine, and I wish I could give her a hug for this. I've had the circular attachment for various machines I've had over the years and have never been able to get it to work properly. After watching this video only once-I was on my way. This is an excellent tutorial and a really fun quilt to make. I have two of these in progress now. Very inspiring and a visual treat with all the vivid colours.
Great DVD. Worth the price. I love Libby Lehman.  I just purchased a circle attachment for my machine. Now I know how to use it! My friends are very impressed with me!
